data.name: AltinbasAddress
data.value: Mahmutbey, Mahmutbey Dilmenler District Mahmutbey Campus No:26, 34218 Bağcılar/İstanbul

data.name: AltinbasExplanation
data.value:
In 2014, I entered university life with Kemerburgaz University Computer Engineering department, which I won with 75% scholarship. In my school, which changed its name to Altınbaş University during my education life, I had the opportunity to develop myself in professional and social fields.

Vocational Lessons:
- Relational Database Management Systems Course
- Software Engineering Course
- C Course
- Java OOP Course
- Algorithms Course
- Operationg Systems Course
- Artificial Intelligence Course
- Web Services Course
- Web Technologies Course

Projects:
- NQueens Winforms application solved via using DFS Algorithm. (Artificial Intelligence Course)
-TicTacToe Winforms application created by using Min - Max Algorithm. (Artificial Intelligence Course)
- Last Man Standing C# Console App. (Artifical Intelligence Course)
- Shopping Site via using ASP.NET MVC and Entity Framework. (Web Technologies Course)
- Application for Graduation Project, including Forum, Live Chat, Screen Sharing and Note Calculator:
- Entity Framework Code First, Generic Repository and Unit Of Work Design Patterns are used in the database section.
- Bootstrap, jQuery and AJAX technologies were used for front - end development.

data.name: BAALAddress
data.value: Bahçeşehir 2. Section, Şelale District, Ata Street No 3/2, 34538 Başakşehir/İstanbul

data.name: BAALExplanation
data.value: At 12th grade, I continued my education life at Bahçeşehir Atatürk Anatolian High School

data.name: BahcelievlerExplanation
data.value:
- Number guessing game was made with C # Console Application.
- Patricipated ASP.NET MVC projects.
- Developed Fuel Tracking project using Entity Framework and WinForms.

data.name: CicekSepetiAddress
data.value: Esentepe District, Kore Şehitleri Street, No.16/1 Ground Floor 34394 Zincirlikuyu/İstanbul

data.name: DeFactoExplanation
data.value:
- Software solutions were developed for HR department using Angular and ASP.NET CORE.
- Python, Data Science and Artificial Intelligence educations were given.

data.name: EAIOAddress
data.value: Esenkent, Enver Paşa District Onur Güvener Street No:1, 34510 Esenyurt/İstanbul

data.name: EAIOExplanation
data.value:
I successfully graduated from Esenkent Atatürk Primary School, which I passed towards the end of the first half of the 8th grade, and laid the foundations of high school life solidly.
Earned Certificates:
- Honour Certificate at both of the semesters.

data.name: GGSoftExplanation
data.value:
- In the company that develops software with .NET technologies, ASP.NET MVC projects and its own software Paperwork product was developed.
- Font Viewer application was made with ASP.NET MVC.
- Participated in converting Paperwork product from Silverlight to MVC.

data.name: IdeconAddress
data.value: Oruç Reis District Tekstilkent Street No: 12 Koza Plaza A Blok Floor:14 Apartment: 51, 34235 Esenler

data.name: IdeconExplanation
data.value:
- Cash Flow project was developed using ASP.NET MVC Web API CORE and Dapper.
- Using Python Flask Framework, Google OCR and Spacy library, OCR reading "Expense" application with machine learning was developed.
- Reconciliation and Electronic Account Statement applications were installed and maintained on customer servers.

data.name: NHIOExplanation

I started my education life at Nilüfer Hatun Primary School until first semester of 8th grade including the kidergarten.
Gained Certificates:
- Participation certificate for attending 23th April National Sovereignty and Children's Day Event.
- Succession and participation certificate for school's social, educational and sportive events.
- Participation certificate for reading contest named "10 Beautiful Piece".
